Public Remarks: The Subject Property is strategically located within the Anniedale - Tynehead Neighborhood Concept Plan (NCP) in Surrey. This area is in the North East sector of Surrey located just South of Highway 1 in close proximity to Highway 15/Pacifi c Hwy. According to the NCP, this area will be the last large area of Surrey for comprehensive development with up to 8000 dwellings and 21,000 new residents when fully built out. The NCP designates the area for a variety of land uses including commercial, light industrial, business park, institutional and a range of multi-family and single family housing density (2 to 45 units per acre). There are lots of potential for redevelopment here. Call for further details.
